mapper.select: SELECT employee_no, employee_name, employee_email, employee_rank, employee_class, admin_id, employee_authority, employee_state FROM employee ORDER BY employee_no DESC

SELECT employee_no, employee_name, admin_id, admin_pw, employee_email, employee_class, employee_authority, employee_tel, employee_state, employee_img, employee_rank, employee_overview
FROM employee WHERE employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee( employee_no, employee_name, admin_id, admin_pw, employee_email, employee_class, employee_authority, employee_tel, employee_state, employee_img, employee_rank, employee_overview) VALUES( employee_sq.nextval, #{employee_name}, #{admin_id}, #{admin_pw}, #{employee_email}, #{employee_class}, #{employee_authority}, #{employee_tel}, #{employee_state}, #{employee_img}, #{employee_rank}, #{employee_overview} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET employee_email = #{employee_email}, employee_class = #{employee_class}, employee_authority = #{employee_authority}, employee_tel = #{employee_tel}, employee_state = #{employee_state}, employee_img = #{employee_img}, employee_rank = #{employee_rank}, employee_overview = #{employee_overview} WHERE employee_no = #{employee_no}
